verses.verse: Then I looked, <WH7200> and, behold, <WH2009> in the firmament <WH7549> that was above <WH5921> the head <WH7218> of the cherubim <WH3742> there appeared <WH7200> over <WH5921> them as it were a sapphire <WH5601> stone, <WH68> as the appearance <WH4758> of the likeness <WH1823> of a throne. <WH3678>

And he spoke <WH559> to the man <WH376> clothed <WH3847> with linen, <WH906> and said, <WH559> Go <WH935> in between <WH996> the wheels, <WH1534> even under <WH413> <WH8478> the cherub, <WH3742> and fill <WH4390> your hand <WH2651> with coals <WH1513> of fire <WH784> from between <WH996> the cherubim, <WH3742> and scatter <WH2236> them over <WH5921> the city. <WH5892> And he went <WH935> in in my sight. <WH5869>

Now the cherubim <WH3742> stood <WH5975> on the right <WH3225> side <WH3225> of the house, <WH1004> when the man <WH376> went <WH935> in; and the cloud <WH6051> filled <WH4390> the inner <WH6442> court. <WH2691>

Then the glory <WH3519> of the LORD <WH3068> went <WH7311> up from the cherub, <WH3742> and stood over <WH5921> the threshold <WH4670> of the house; <WH1004> and the house <WH1004> was filled <WH4390> with the cloud, <WH6051> and the court <WH2691> was full <WH4390> of the brightness <WH5051> of the LORD's <WH3068> glory. <WH3519>

And the sound <WH6963> of the cherubims' <WH3742> wings <WH3671> was heard <WH8085> even to the outer <WH2435> court, <WH2691> as the voice <WH6963> of the Almighty <WH7706> God <WH410> when he speaks. <WH1696>

And it came <WH1961> to pass, that when he had commanded <WH6680> the man <WH376> clothed <WH3847> with linen, <WH906> saying, <WH559> Take <WH3947> fire <WH784> from between <WH996> the wheels, <WH1534> from between <WH996> the cherubim; <WH3742> then he went <WH935> in, and stood <WH5975> beside <WH681> the wheels. <WH212>

And one cherub <WH3742> stretched <WH7971> forth his hand <WH3027> from between <WH996> the cherubim <WH3742> to the fire <WH784> that was between <WH996> the cherubim, <WH3742> and took <WH5375> thereof, and put <WH5414> it into <WH413> the hands <WH2651> of him that was clothed <WH3847> with linen: <WH906> who took <WH3947> it, and went <WH3318> out.
And there appeared <WH7200> in the cherubim <WH3742> the form <WH8403> of a man's <WH120> hand <WH3027> under <WH8478> their wings. <WH3671>

And when I looked, <WH7200> behold <WH2009> the four <WH702> wheels <WH212> by the cherubim, <WH3742> one <WH259> wheel <WH212> by one cherub, <WH3742> and another <WH259> wheel <WH212> by another <WH259> cherub: <WH3742> and the appearance <WH4758> of the wheels <WH212> was as the color <WH5869> of a beryl <WH8658> stone. <WH68>
And as for their appearances, <WH4758> they four <WH702> had <WH1961> one <WH259> likeness, <WH1823> as if <WH834> a wheel <WH212> had been <WH1961> in the middle <WH8432> of a wheel. <WH212>

When they went, <WH3212> they went <WH3212> on their four <WH702> sides; <WH7253> they turned <WH5437> not as they went, <WH3212> but to the place <WH4725> where <WH834> the head <WH7218> looked <WH6437> they followed <WH3212> <WH310> it; they turned <WH5437> not as they went. <WH3212>

And their whole <WH3605> body, <WH1320> and their backs, <WH1354> and their hands, <WH3027> and their wings, <WH3671> and the wheels, <WH212> were full <WH4392> of eyes <WH5869> round <WH5439> about, even the wheels <WH212> that they four <WH702> had.
As for the wheels, <WH212> it was cried <WH7121> to them in my hearing, <WH241> O wheel. <WH1534>

And every one <WH259> had four <WH702> faces: <WH6440> the first <WH259> face <WH6440> was the face <WH6440> of a cherub, <WH3742> and the second <WH8145> face <WH6440> was the face <WH6440> of a man, <WH120> and the third <WH7992> the face <WH6440> of a lion, <WH738> and the fourth <WH7243> the face <WH6440> of an eagle. <WH5404>
And the cherubim <WH3742> were lifted <WH7426> up. This <WH1931> is the living <WH2416> creature <WH2416> that I saw <WH7200> by the river <WH5104> of Chebar. <WH3529>

And when the cherubim <WH3742> went, <WH3212> the wheels <WH212> went <WH3212> by them: and when the cherubim <WH3742> lifted <WH5375> up their wings <WH3671> to mount <WH7311> up from the earth, <WH776> the same <WH1992> wheels <WH212> also <WH1571> turned <WH5437> not from beside <WH681> them.

When they stood, <WH5975> these stood; <WH5975> and when they were lifted <WH7311> up, these lifted <WH7426> up themselves also: for the spirit <WH7307> of the living <WH2416> creature <WH2416> was in them.
Then the glory <WH3519> of the LORD <WH3068> departed <WH3318> from off <WH5921> the threshold <WH4670> of the house, <WH1004> and stood <WH5975> over <WH5921> the cherubim. <WH3742>

And the cherubim <WH3742> lifted <WH5375> up their wings, <WH3671> and mounted <WH7426> up from the earth <WH776> in my sight: <WH5869> when they went <WH3318> out, the wheels <WH212> also were beside <WH5980> them, and every one stood <WH5975> at the door <WH6607> of the east <WH6931> gate <WH8179> of the LORD's <WH3068> house; <WH1004> and the glory <WH3519> of the God <WH430> of Israel <WH3478> was over <WH5921> them above. <WH4605>

This <WH1931> is the living <WH2416> creature <WH2416> that I saw <WH7200> under <WH8478> the God <WH430> of Israel <WH3478> by the river <WH5104> of Chebar; <WH3529> and I knew <WH3045> that they were the cherubim. <WH3742>

Every one <WH259> had four <WH702> faces <WH6440> apiece, <WH259> and every one <WH259> four <WH702> wings; <WH3671> and the likeness <WH1823> of the hands <WH3027> of a man <WH120> was under <WH8478> their wings. <WH3671>

And the likeness <WH1823> of their faces <WH6440> was the same <WH1992> faces <WH6440> which <WH834> I saw <WH7200> by the river <WH5104> of Chebar, <WH3529> their appearances <WH4758> and themselves: they went <WH3212> every <WH376> one <WH376> straight <WH5676> forward. <WH6440>
